numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The national basketball associations have the highest percentage of players of color among all sports.
2. The national football league has the second highest percentage of players of color.
3. The percentage of head coaches of color is much lower than the percentage of players of color.
4. Soccer has the highest percentage of coaches of color.
5. Soccer is a worldly sport.
6. The high percentage of coaches of color in soccer makes sense.
7. American sports tend to have low diversity in coaching staff.
8. Football is an American sport.
9. Baseball is an American sport.
10. Football has low diversity in coaching staff.
11. Baseball has low diversity in coaching staff.
12. We wonder why there are fewer coaches of color than players of color.
13. There may be more players of color than coaches of color.
14. There may be discrimination against coaches of color in some sports leagues.
15. A coach must satisfy some criteria.
16. A coach must satisfy some standards.
17. There may be a specific reason why some players of color do not pursue a head coach career.
18. This graph highlights a lack of coaches of color in school sports.
19. This graph highlights a lack of people of color in leadership positions in school sports.
20. This graph emphasizes the issue of racial inequality in the sports system.
21. If there are more coaches of color then more kids of color will feel comfortable participating in these activities.
22. If there are more coaches of color then kids of color will get more opportunities in the sport that they choose.
23. The headline is: The lack of diversity in sports leadership.
